website_summaries.verdict: Popular amino acid chelated copper supplement.
pros: Chelated in rice protein, so it's soy-free
Solid and trusted choice for copper deficiency issues
cons: Minor complaints of capsules arriving rancid
Large capsules hard for some to swallow

customer_reviews.title: however the last 2 orders I got had a terrible smell and taste
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased this brand of copper, however the last 2 orders I got had a terrible smell and taste. I mean, it gagged me. Not sure if it is the capsules that are rancid or the product itself. Before ingesting the capsules, I suggest smelling inside your bottle to make sure they're okay. I am steering clear of Solaray Copper until they get this problem remedied. Thank goodness for Amazon's terrific return/refund policy!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: If you are copper deficient (make sure to get a micronutrient panel to know for sure) then this form of copper is great for you
customer_reviews.text: Taking this supplement has seriously changed my life. It just goes to show you that one nutrient can make a huge difference. If you are copper deficient (make sure to get a micronutrient panel to know for sure) then this form of copper is great for you. Don't just take copper on a whim though, many people have excess copper and taking a supplement may exacerbate symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: my first experience with this brand
customer_reviews.text: The product I received had a 4/2022 expiration date, but it smelled so rancid when I opened the bottle it was nauseating. Nonetheless, I decided to go against my gut and try one capsule anyway. The violent sharp pain I felt in my stomach minutes later convinced me NOT to try another. The product is going into the trash and I will never ever buy another Solaray supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Sand

customer_reviews.title: No liver pain with this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I was taking a copper supplement from the SOLGAR brand and everytime I took the tablet i would get pain near my liver area, maybe I got a bad batch from them. I was beginning to become afraid of taking copper supplements, but I needed copper in my diet. I bought from this brand and have been taking the capsule for a week.. No pain whatsoever! Will continue to use this brand of copper.
customer_reviews.author: TheOne

customer_reviews.title: as related to my spotty usage, this product is good...
customer_reviews.text: I do like these, never had a copper supplement before this so not really comparing it to other brands, just enjoyed the way it settled my stomach near the end of my meal. Ate this in conjunction with one "30mg, vitamin code, raw zinc tablet) just as I was finishing my meal. Have not used this long term, nor do I use it daily, but as related to my spotty usage, this product is good.
customer_reviews.author: E M

customer_reviews.title: Helps get what I need when I don't eat liver
customer_reviews.text: Along with a few other things is a substitute for eating liver every week. see perfecthealthdiet dot com and look for supplements for the full list with links to amazon

customer_reviews.title: I feel like the sprouts of grey have slowed down
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading lack of copper could cause gray hairs. I feel like the sprouts of grey have slowed down...

customer_reviews.title: but the last batch smelled and tasted like they'd been cooked in a hot warehouse
customer_reviews.text: I'm copper deficient, causes cognitive and memory issues. Taking 6mg daily is still not enough for me, but this does seem to help a bit. I've ordered this brand before, but the last batch smelled and tasted like they'd been cooked in a hot warehouse. Had to return.

customer_reviews.title: Is this normal???
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if copper is supposed to smell/taste like this but it's rank like rancid food. I nearly gagged.

customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells terrible and tasted rancid. I won't be buying anything from Solaray again!

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with caution
customer_reviews.text: The pills smell very off and I became immediately sick after taking one. I would be very careful with these.

customer_reviews.title: I like Solaray because they chealate their minerals to rice protein
customer_reviews.text: I take this as part of my bone mineral routine, included with 15mg zinc to balance it-taken at a different time. They are antagonistic.. I like Solaray because they chealate their minerals to rice protein,instead of soy protein which is what other supplement companies use. I will always make an effort to avoid soy and the risk it carries for breast cancer.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs some Copper.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. If you drink reverse osmosis water, chances are you are low in copper since it filters it out.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference--being copper deficient isn't fun but after just 2 weeks on this product I already see big changes!

customer_reviews.title: it okay but I cannot swallow pills and i need ...
customer_reviews.text: it okay but I cannot swallow pills and i need to buy a liquid copper....this an unfair review due to my issues!!

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: If you need extra copper this is the way to go. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Mindylu

customer_reviews.title: The product appears to satisfy the 2mg requirement
customer_reviews.text: The product appears to satisfy the 2mg requirement. The only reason I gave a 4 star rating was the large capsules ---- smaller tablets are available.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: what the Doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to help with the increased zinc that I am taking for my surgery. At a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I recommend taking it with food
customer_reviews.text: Word of warning->I discovered when taking copper on an empty stomach it causes extreme nausea and instant stomach cramps within 20-30mins. The nausea would come on suddenly. Taken with food I have no problems. I take copper 1 capsule 3 days a week only because I take zinc [PepZinGi]. I've read that taking zinc depletes copper. Zinc to copper ratio recommended is 15:1. I read to multiply daily zinc intake by two then divide by 15 to get amount of copper to take. Also read not to take zinc and copper at same time.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Rancid
customer_reviews.text: The capsules were rancid. Not the copper, of course, but the capsule material. You know how if you buy something like shelled sunflower seeds and you don't eat them right away, and then three months later you go to eat them and they have this nasty smell? That's what these smelled like. And i didn't realize it until i took three of them. Then when i was on the treadmill a while later the smell came up again. Nasty. This is a recognized brand, so i was surprised, and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SEEMS TO HELP CHANGE MY GRAY HAIR BACK TO NORMAL COLOR

customer_reviews.text: It is a lifeline and I thank Solaray for its availability, the most critical nutrient and absent in processed foods, 4 mg a day necessary to prevent heart disease by stimulating growth of arteries and veins, and stops cancer by forming the enzyme superoxide dismutase in our cells which protects every cell in our body agains destructive superoxide... Thanks SOLARAY!! At age 71 just dug a 4 ft deep 4 x 4 foot hole in my garden, to bury garden waste, and thought nothing of it!!

customer_reviews.text: One of those minerals we need...but the effectiveness is a mystery... no overt physical response or feeling with it...probably need a blood test to assess results.

customer_reviews.text: I purchased this supplement for my husband cause it was recommended. Have been taking for about a week and really don't know any change. Will continue taking until bottle is gone to see if there is any difference. It arrived quickly after ordering.

Ok, I'm trying it but since I just started can't say for sure. Just make sure u take zinc with it. If it works will let ya'll know :)

product_meta.title: Solaray Copper 2 mg | Healthy Red Blood Cell Formation, Immune and Nerve Function Support | Non-GMO | 100ct
product_meta.description:
Involved in a long list of bodily functions for vibrant, glowing health, this essential trace mineral packs a big punch. 

Naturally found in all the body’s tissues, copper is a vital component of enzymes responsible for energy production, immune system and nerve function, connective tissue maintenance, red blood cell formation, the body’s absorption of iron and much more. 

Committed to crafting superior products that just work better, we bring you Solaray Copper 2 mg. This hardworking supplement provides 222% of the daily value in a bioavailable amino acid chelate form. Minerals in this formula are reacted with aspartic acid, whole rice concentrate, citric acid and glycine for faster absorption and utilization. 

Like all Solaray products, Copper is lab verified for potency, purity, and identity. That means what you see on the label is what you get – nothing more, nothing less. Confidence in the Solaray name is just one of the reasons we’ve been around so long and maintain our place as a leader in the industry. Unlike many other companies, we manufacture almost all our own products, which gives us the ability to thoroughly test and screen raw ingredients for the slightest amount of impurities and manage the production process to provide the best possible quality. In fact, we’re so committed to quality that if an ingredient doesn’t meet our unparalleled standard, we send it back. Rest assured, only the purest formulas ever reach your cabinet. 

Vegan & non-GMO, trust Solaray Copper to Help Let Your Best Self Shine! Safety Warning Warning: Do not use if safety seal is broken or missing. Keep out of reach of children. Keep your licensed health care practitioner informed when using this product. Indications Healthy energy production, immune system and nerve function, connective tissue maintenance, red blood cell formation, and iron absorption support Ingredients Copper (as Copper Amino Acid Chelate Complex); Other Ingredients: Whole Rice Concentrate, Vegetable Cellulose Capsule, Rice Extract Blend, Citric Acid (from Non-GMO Tapioca) and Silica. Directions Use only as directed. Take on VegCap daily with a meal or glass of water. Store in a cool, dry place. Legal Disclaimer These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: Copper Chelate: Copper amino acid chelate complex for faster absorption and utilization
Energize: Important trace mineral responsible for energy production & red blood cell formation
Feel Well Support: May help support healthy immune system function and connective tissue maintenance
Trusted Brand: Made in our own facility; Non-GMO, vegan & lab verified for potency & purity
